name: Akasa Spa
tag_list: spa-package, corporate-gift-ideas, management-spa, gifting, home-saloon, massages
overview:
Akasa spa Providing the services in management spa, corporate gift ideas, spa package, massages, home saloon, Gifting.

At Akasa Spa our Mission is to bring wholesome wellness in your life through our SPA Services and our Aim is to bring world class luxurious SPA services at the most affordable rates at your doorstep.

Akasa Spa is run by a team of highly skilled professionals who have training and experience of working at International SPAs, which help us to bring wide range of services, unique and highly customized products at your doorsteps.

So indulge & pamper yourself with our array of specialized Spa treatments while our team of specialists transform your home into a serene paradise of sensory bliss.
